name: The 3D Spacewar
overview: 3D Crosshairs style space-themed blasting action created using SEUCK but using the software in a very different way to that point. 3D Space Wars is an Operation Wolf-style blaster but one that is set in a galaxy far, far away. You control the laser targeter using your joystick and blast away at anything that moves, and there is a LOT of movement.
